MWC.GUI

Interface ErrorLogger

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ToolParent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Application, AWTApplication, ImportReplay.testImport.TestParent, LoggingService, SwingApplication

    public interface ErrorLogger
    interface for classes that are able to fire/throw error messages
    Author:
    Ian Mayo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR
      Status type severity (bit mask, value 4) indicating this status represents an error.
      static int INFO
      Status type severity (bit mask, value 1) indicating this status is informational only.
      static int OK
      Status severity constant (value 0) indicating this status represents the nominal case.
      static int WARNING
      Status type severity (bit mask, value 2) indicating this status represents a warning.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logError(int status, java.lang.String text, java.lang.Exception e)
      log an error, somehow
      void logError(int status, java.lang.String text, java.lang.Exception e, boolean revealLog)
      log an error, somehow
      void logStack(int status, java.lang.String text)
      show the current call stack

    • Field Detail

      • OK

        static final int OK
        Status severity constant (value 0) indicating this status represents the nominal case. This constant is also used as the status code representing the nominal case.
        See Also:
        #getSeverity(), #isOK(), Constant Field Values

      • INFO

        static final int INFO
        Status type severity (bit mask, value 1) indicating this status is informational only.
        See Also:
        #getSeverity(), #matches(int), Constant Field Values

      • WARNING

        static final int WARNING
        Status type severity (bit mask, value 2) indicating this status represents a warning.
        See Also:
        #getSeverity(), #matches(int), Constant Field Values

      • ERROR

        static final int ERROR
        Status type severity (bit mask, value 4) indicating this status represents an error.
        See Also:
        #getSeverity(), #matches(int), Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • logError

        void logError(int status,
              java.lang.String text,
              java.lang.Exception e)
        log an error, somehow
        Parameters:
        status - the status code (error, warning, etc)
        text - the error message to display/record
        e - any relevant exceptin

      • logError

        void logError(int status,
              java.lang.String text,
              java.lang.Exception e,
              boolean revealLog)
        log an error, somehow
        Parameters:
        status - the status code (error, warning, etc)
        text - the error message to display/record
        e - any relevant exceptin
        revealLog - whether to force the error log to be visible
